text.div:
This code system http://fhir.cqgc.ferlab.bio/CodeSystem/service-request-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
WXS Whole Exome SequencingProcess of determining the complete DNA sequence of the genome at a single time
WGS Whole Genome SequencingProcess of determining all of the exons within the genome sequence at a single time
GP Gene PanelProcess of determining the complete sequences of the indicated gene panel at a single time

Additional Language Displays

CodeFrench (fr)
WXSSéquençage du Génome Entier
WGSSéquençage de l'Exome Entier
GPPanel de Gènes

name: service-request-code
title: service request code
description: Codes of service request in our system
